BTFG.CompendiumChooser.Title: Compendium chooser
BTFG.CompendiumChooser.NotCompendium: You can only drop a compendium.
BTFG.CompendiumChooser.Explaination: Choose the compendium to process by droping it from the compendium list to the area below.
BTFG.CompendiumChooser.DropHere: Drop your compendium in this area
BTFG.CompendiumExporter.Title: Compendium exporter
BTFG.CompendiumExporter.WarnBabeleActive: Please note, the export must not be launched on a compendium that has been translated by Babele because the source data is no longer all accessible once it has been initialized.
BTFG.CompendiumExporter.CustomMappingHin: (first field: key used in the translation file; second field: path to the data in the document)
BTFG.ExporterInstanciator.InvalidCompend: Can not create exporter for the compendium {label}
BTFG.Exporter.PleaseWait: Processing compendium {label}. Please be patient, it can take a while depending on the data present inside.
